snippet.title: Escape The Crimson Room [Complete Walkthrough]
snippet.description:
I choose to start my uploads with my favourite escape room, the Crimson Room. This is the complete guide of the game. 

link for the game: http://www.momchill.com/crimson_room.swf
link for Takagism information: http://takagism.net/index_e.html

Please Like, Subscribe and Comment if you want more game guides.
